title: Hawks' Turnaround Lures In Atlanta's Flightly Fans
teaser: It's been a roller coaster year for the Atlanta Hawks. The team has won 17 games in a row and fans are flocking to see them. It comes as the team is for sale and some were alienated after a racially-charged email surfaced from the team's owner.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
